metaTitle: Sell Caol Ila Whisky | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Caol Ila whisky. We buy 25 Year, 35 Year, and limited unpeated releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy aged and rare Caol Ila single malts.
introParagraph: Caol Ila is a giant of Islay, known for its consistent quality. While much goes into blends, its official age-statement releases are excellent. We purchase Caol Ila 25 Year, 30 Year, 35 Year, and the annual unpeated special releases. We also buy rare independent bottlings of Caol Ila.
whatWeBuy: Caol Ila Unpeated Style (Highland Style) Special Releases
pricingFactors: Release type (Diageo Special Release 'Unpeated' vs standard)

faqs.question: Do you buy Caol Ila 12 Year?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy single bottles of Caol Ila 12 Year. We focus on the older expressions.

faqs.question: What are the Unpeated releases?
faqs.answer: These are annual limited releases from Diageo that are unpeated 'Highland Style' Caol Ila. They are collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy Feis Ile bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the annual Feis Ile festival bottlings from Caol Ila.

faqs.question: Do you buy independent bottlings?
faqs.answer: Yes, older independent bottlings (Gordon & MacPhail, Signatory) are often very valuable.

faqs.question: How do I ship?
faqs.answer: We provide a label. Pack securely in a box with bubble wrap.

faqs.question: Is the 25 Year valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, the factory 25 Year Old is a core premium release we purchase.
